text:
Edward Hirsch remembers his long friendship with the late W. S. Merwin
via @parisreview
author: Iddybud

text: I was privileged to have met and spoken with W.S. Merwin when he visited Davidson College. He signed the page with my favorite poem that he'd written. A gentle soul. A great poet. I'm very sad to hear the news of his passing. May he rest in peace.
author: Iddybud

text: I was privileged to have met and spoken with W.S. Merwin when he visited Davidson College. He was a great poet, a caring human being. I'm very sad to hear the news of his passing. May he rest in peace.
author: Iddybud

text: Falwell obviously doesn't truly believe in the example Jesus set when He walked among us men & women. America's not ruled by Kings. If Falwell believed in Jesus' example and the accompanying spirit of a government OF & BY THE PEOPLE, I would hear it in his words. I DON'T HEAR IT.
author: Iddybud

text: It's disgusting to watch.
author: Iddybud

text:
He wants vigilantes. He wants to institute Trump thuggery.
I say, no vigilantes. Let's remain a nation of civil laws that are respected. Those laws have long been in place for security and stability; for the public peace; for good, sound reason.
author: Iddybud

text: I understand.
author: Iddybud

text: "When we find ourselves facing adversity, we may think we've reached our limit, but actually the more trying the circumstances, the closer we are to making a breakthrough.The darker the night, the nearer the dawn."  ~ Daisaku Ikeda #FridayMotivation

text:
.There WAS NO "OTHER SIDE."
They were looking out for this nation and you, Sen. Graham look downright ungrateful for having professional men and women who cared so deeply.
LOOK AT WHAT YOU'VE BECOME, SIR.
author: Iddybud

text:
.The narrative's not "they wanted him to lose" but, in the face of all held dearly by true-hearted patriots, they knew this man could WIN!
Big difference.
They understood potential consequences.
Stability of the nation and following her laws is paramount to FBI/DOJ professionals.
author: Iddybud

text: As I left the Oncology center this morning with my son, who is receiving treatment for a brain tumor, I heard the sound from a lone bagpipe player. It lifted our spirits. Thank you for your #kindness, Sir. We're most grateful for your gift of music. #StPatricksDay
author: Iddybud

text:
Sign of #kindness, sign of #hope.
